issue.title: Can not build gazebo on Arch linux from source with gcc 9.2.0

content.raw:
I think this is the root cause: [link to commit](https://github.com/kcat/openal-soft/commit/399dfca1e3352050a5289be6bcd7b7dce353ccf8)

Essentially, as the commit message says:

> Those names were never
part of any specification, and I don't know why the struct names differed from
the actual type name. But with C++, which takes the original struct declaration
as the original name, it was affecting the type's internal symbols.

> This shouldn't affect user code since ALCdevice_struct and ALCcontext_struct
were never part of the spec. If issues arise from this change, it should be
reported.
content.html:
I think this is the root cause: link to commit

Essentially, as the commit message says:

Those names were never part of any specification, and I don't know why the struct names differed from the actual type name. But with C++, which takes the original struct declaration as the original name, it was affecting the type's internal symbols.

This shouldn't affect user code since ALCdevice_struct and ALCcontext_struct were never part of the spec. If issues arise from this change, it should be reported.
